author: While
title: Talk:PPSSPP
text: Difference between revisions of "Talk:PPSSPP" (PPSSPP is not free.) | (No difference) | Latest revision as of 07:48, 22 November 2024 It is not free software for these reasons: 1- It includes a games store in the Homebrew and demos section called PPSSPP Homebrew Store, these games do not have a specific license, and apparently no source code to support it. 2- PSP games are proprietary, and since there are no free games the program is useless and is only a "temptation" for the user to play proprietary games.
